The number of upgrade slots a specific suit of armor has is noted  under that armor's description. You can install an armor upgrade  with the Install Upgrade activity, which takes 10 minutes to  perform. Unlike many other types of equipment, armor upgrades  run on kinetic energy created by your body's motion, and they  don't need external batteries. queries.query_text: What is the rule about Some armor upgrades that have special activations and benefits  can be activated only a limited number of times per day, as  described in the armor upgrade. This limit is independent of any  costs for activating the upgrade. This limit resets during your  daily preparations. The limit is inherent to the armor upgrade, so  if an ability that can be used only once per day is used, it doesn't  refresh if the armor upgrade is uninstalled and reinstalled or is  installed in another suit of armor, or if another creature tries to  activate the upgrade. Similarly, armor has innate safety overrides  that prevent you from installing a duplicate of an armor upgrade  you've already used the limited action of and from trying to use  that action again.?
